New Feature
Introducing HTTP/2
HTTP/2 in CloudFlare
HTTP/2 is the new and improved version of HTTP and is optimized for the modern website—making CSS, JavaScript, image assets and any other resources load simultaneously without complicated techniques like domain sharding and file concatenation. You can read more about it here.
Turn on HTTP/2
